titleStmt.title: A curse become a blessing: or, A sermon preached in the parish church of S. John the Baptist, in the Ile of Thannet, in the country of Kent, at the funerall of that vertuous and worthy gentleman Mr. Paul Cleybrooke Esquire. By William Stone preacher of Gods word: on Tuesday, September 17. 1622
titleStmt.author: Stone, William, preacher of Gods word.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for William Sheffard, and are to be sold at his shop at the entring in of Popes-head Alley out of Lombard street,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; print show-through, some leaves cropped at head, and several pages stained; title page stained so as to be illegible. Beginning-page 15 from British Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the entring in of Popes-head Alley out of Lombard street
